snippet: A new graphical tool from the New York Fed allows users to study eight aspects of the labor market, including the mismatch between job skills and openings.
abstract: A new graphical tool from the New York Fed allows users to study eight aspects of the labor market, including the mismatch between job skills and openings.

headline.main: Visualizing the Dynamics of the Labor Market

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
